snippet: Until now Dave Robertson was a rising Yankees reliever. Now — and almost surely for the rest of the season — Mariano Rivera’s replacement.
abstract: New York Yankees relief pitcher Dave Robertson is slated to become Mariano Rivera's replacement as closer. Chart, Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: Until now, Dave Robertson was a rising deputy, an increasingly valuable piece of the Yankees bullpen. Until now, Robertson's solid fastball was admired, his deceptive curveball feared and his charming nickname -- Houdini, born of his ability to escape with runners on base -- enjoyed with a laugh.

headline.main: In Instant, Understudy Becomes the Successor
